comments.text:
With bug 1637343 we replaced the default test strategy, seta, with a new one. But SETA used to disable itself when running on a non-autoland project. The new one doesn't.

As a result, we are optimizing 1000s of test tasks off of each central push. Ironically this is something we want to do anyway, but not like this.
comments.raw_text:
